attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition calls for the sacking of Hazel Blears from the Cabinet and as a Member of Parliament. The recent newspaper reporting of her manipulation of the "rules" governing her “personal” expenses shows she lacks the necessary integrity and moral fibre to hold a position of trust. She has acted against the interests of her constituents and the wider British Public and disgraced her office. In addition, she has added to the growing feeling of distrust in all MP's integrity and honesty. Her position is untenable and she should be removed from office.

rejection.details: Hazel Blears resigned her Cabinet post on 3 June 2009. If you are calling for her to be deselected by the Labour party, that is a party matter and you should contact the party.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
